hud_quiver.config.title: HUD Quiver
hud_quiver.config.animate.desc: Animate the HUD Quiver showing and hiding
hud_quiver.config.hide.desc: Hide the HUD Quiver when not selecting a shootable item
hud_quiver.config.fade_queue.desc: Set the trailing arrows in the queue's color to be faded
hud_quiver.config.horizontal_offset.desc: The margin on the left of the HUD Quiver
hud_quiver.config.vertical_offset.desc: The margin on the top of the HUD Quiver
hud_quiver.config.size.desc: The width and height of the HUD Quiver
hud_quiver.config.speed.desc: The speed at which the HUD Quiver animates in and out
